Dialogue.Dialogue:
Oh, hello there!
-Present Given-
A present for me? Well thank you! I can't wait to find out what it is... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh, it's a honey decanter! Most people don't know this, but letting your honey air out a bit improves the taste. I'm preaching to the choir though. Because you have good taste too! You know me so well. Now let me give you some gifts! Including the ! With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Sunflower Field and +5% Honey Per Pollen! Hope you like it! Happy Honeydays!

The Honeydays bring the bees so much joy!
-Present Given-
Oh! For me? You shouldn’t have! Let’s see what it is....(krumple krumple)...Oh my gosh, a precious Cub Buddy salt shaker set! Look, Black Cub for Pepper and Polar Cub for salt. I love it! They remind me of my own cubs. Thank you so much! Now for your gifts! A , a jar of ...And the ! With this on the tree, you’ll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Strawberry Field And +10% Pollen from Bees! Now of you’ll excuse me, I’m going to go fill these up!

Man, it's cold!
-Present Given-
But not too cold for us to exchange gifts! So what is it, huh? What'd you get ol' Brown Bear? Whoa! A 1 year subscription to Bearmazon Prime! I'll get so much out of this, you have NO idea! Thanks bud. Now look at what I got you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate; +25% Capacity in the Clover Field; And +20% Pollen from "Bomb" abilities! Happy Beesmas!

Hmm...
-Present Given-
A gift? Oh, that's kind of you. I'll open it now. ...(krumple krumple)... WHOA! A bamboo pull-up bar! This'll help me work on my back muscles. Well, I can't take something without giving you something too. I got you a few gifts, including the . With that on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate; +25% Capacity in the Bamboo Field; And +5% Bee Attack Power! Stay safe out there, and Merry Beesmas.

Beesmas is amazing! But it sure keeps us busy.
-Present Given-
Oh, of course! Time to exchange our gifts. Let’s see what you’ve brought me...Fascinating! A BI-84 scientific calculator! These reliable devices are the standard for universities. Despite being unchanged for over 15 years, they still sell for their original price! Anyways, now for your gifts! Some , ...And the  ornament! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you’ll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Pineapple Patch And +25% Convert Rate at the Hive! That ought to help make this Beesmas productive. Thanks again for all your help. Happy Honeydays!

I'm just happy it's Winter.
-Present Given-
My cousin Bee Bear's entire identity is centered around Beesmas. At first our family thought it was weird, but we've become supportive over the years. Beesmas brings Bee Bear joy and gives him a sense of purpose. Who are we to judge? We all have our quirks. Me, I'm obsessed with cooking. So I hope you brought a cooking related gift! Come on, let me see what you brought. ...(krumple krumple)... Niiiice! A pressure cooker! I've been wanting one of these for ages. For some dishes, this can cut cooking times in half. Now for your gift Some , ... And the  Ornament! With this on the tree, you'll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate, +25% Capacity in the Pumpkin Patch, and +10% White Field Capacity! Well, good luck on the rest of your Bee Bear quests. Happy honeydays!

You're free to warm yourself up in my shop.
-Present Given-
A gift for me? But we hardly know each other. That must mean whatever's in this box is based off first impressions. Well, let's see how you've sized me up. ...(krumple krumple)... Ah! So you think I look smart, huh? It's a book: a Brief History of The Bee Swarm Simulator Mountain. Guess you'll be relieved to hear that I do in fact dabble in books, And I often turn to history as a primary source for inspiration. Thanks, cool stranger. Would you think it weird if I had some gifts waiting for you too? If you did - I wouldn't mind. I got you some , a , A , and something I made myself: The . It's filled with flowers and leaves I grew in my Planters. The fragrance is pretty strong... but hey, smells like Beesmas. With this on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate, +25% Capacity in the Dandelion Field, And +5% Nectar. You're not the only one who judges a book by it's cover. That's why I think we'll be good friends soon enough.

Is it snowing? I can't tell from in this... cave..
-Present Given-
What's that? Uh oh! You didn't have to get me anything. Increasing the player count is a gift in itself. But I guess it would be rude not to open it, right? Ok well here I go! ...(krumple krumple)... Wow!! It's a humidifier! It does get really dry in here during the winter. When it gets dry out, my skin starts acting up - gets really dry. And my contacts start to irritate my eyes. So this is perfect! I hope its powerful to fill in this entire den, or whatever it is were standing in. Anyways, I can't thank you enough. But I can give you this: The ! With it on the Beesmas Tree, you'll recieve these boosts: +25% Convert Rate, +25% Capacity on the Mountain Top Field and +20% Pollen from Tools! Now I'm going to fill this humidifier up see how it works! You keep on honeymaking cause this is the time of year to do it. Make sure you're using your planters and getting that Nectar. Nectar can increase your pollen and convert rate by double. Pay attention to the 5 different Nectar types and where to get them, and it'll make progressing way easier. And make sure to check out the Nectar Pot near the gate into this place. For 5 , you can store 1 Nectar type of your choice. It'll be preserved untill you come back to claim it.  are a bit easier to get now so I'd suggest using it. Dapper Bear's supposed to really emphasize this stuff, but somebody hasn't finished his quests yet... Anyway, thanks a lot! Merry Beesmas!

Mmmm...mhmm...(she's murmuring to herself with her eyes close)...
-Present Given-
I've been counting  all day as they fall onto the fields. (Yawn). Oh, it's quite hypnotic! I keep losing count because, well, it's like counting sheep. At one point, though, I counted. What was it... Over 50 ? I lost count that time because of a Snow Storm. I mean, I can't keep up with that. ... Snow everywhere, like frosting on our Beesmas cake! Decorated with all those delightful contraptions this year. Like that wreath. Hehehh, Black Bear, bless his heart. Look at that Honey Wreath. I won't say more... Oh but Mother Bear's Gingerbread House! Oh, I like that one. ...(she's staring into the distance)... Is that a ? Or... Hmm. I'm tired of counting. I'm bored now. Why bother with something so mundane, in the most exciting time of the year! Bee Bear, oh that precious fool. Don't tell him I called him a fool. Not that he would mind. To think that we mere mortal bears could offend a honeyday deity. Anyways, that sweet, jovial bear, he brightens up the entire mountain in the darkest days of the year. How did we even make it through the winters before him? Well, I mean, I do remember... It wasn't so bad. We just celebrated, we just didn't focus so much on the bees. Not that you bees don't deserve it! Bee Bear is completely right about that. We celebrated the passing of the year in a more general sense. We still ate a lot of the same food, did similar customs, it just felt a little more... off the cusp. We still put ornaments on a tree, you see, we just didn't have a special name for it. Or did we? Hmmm... Was it... Oh, like I'll ever remember. Mother always had a tree, and we dolled it up for winter. Left it up much longer than we probably should have, we were never... punctual. But it was always so, so full of ornaments! Everyone was jealous of our tree. Perhaps the only time our hoarding tendencies were a source of envy. Hah! And things really took off as Beesmas became more and more of a thing. Mother couldn't help herself, any time she saw an ornament on sale. Mmhmm. And some of those - completely unnecessary, Mother. The only thing more imposing than our tree was the size of our debt. How did we even get approved for so many credit cards? Yaach... But it was worth it. You can't put a price on Beesmas Magic. Well, you can, sort of. Just take a look on Bee Bear's Catalog. But you understand what I mean. Those debts are long gone, and here I am countless years later and still reminiscing about our trees. Mother's taste for ornaments - they were well considered. ...(she's staring off into the distance)... ...32... Or was it? Drats. I've lost count again. I can't help myself! I just see the  and I just start... But it's too hard! And it's boring. Let's do something else. What have you come to see me about, anyhow, dear? What's that you're holding - it's for me? Oh! A gift! Will you open it for Spirit Bear? My hands are full, you know. And sore. ...(You open the present for Spirit Bear)... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh no! Oh no no no! This - this is just too much! It's a... picture frame? With no picture. ... A what now? It's electronic? Oh dear you know I'm no good with electronics. Is this a television? No? What? A digital picture frame? The only digits I understand are the 10 on my paws, dear. I appreciate it, I do! I'll try my best to get some use out of it. I could just, tape a photo on it. Nooo... I'll do it. I'll figure it out. Thank you, you're so sweet. ... OK, goodbye now. ... Oh! YOUR gift! Yes yes I have one for you! A few things, actually. Including my ! With that on the tree, well, I don't quite recall what it does. You can check the tree yourself. (Yawn). First, why not check out that strange  in the Dandelion Field. Merry Beesmas, dear!

Bzz zzz zzuh...
-Present Given-
Bzzz buz ZZ! ZZZZZ BZZ BZZZZ!!! ...(krumple krumple)... (You open up the  for Honey Bee) (The box is filled to the brim with honey) BUZZZZZZZUH BZZZZZZZ! Bzz zz zz! (Honey Bee's eye open wide with joy) (You can tell it's very grateful) Bzzzz zzz buzz bz BUZ zz. (Honey Bee pulls out a plastic bag full of honey) (Inside floats a crude plastic figurine of Honey Bee) Zzzz! (You can sense that with this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts:) (+10% Convert Rate) (+10% Capacity) (+5% Mark Duration) (And +10% Honey From Tokens) Bzz zuh Buzz buzz BuzzZuhz (Honey Bee smiles warmly)

I'm just happy it's Winter.
-Present Given-
Wait, don't tell me you've brought a ? Of all the beekeepers I've met, you really are the coolest! One second, let me just try to unwrap this with my wings somehow... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh, it's a  Beequip! Well, this is a little awkward... Bucko Bees can't equip . But don't worry. I've got plenty of blue bee friends here at the HQ who will make great use out of this! Thanks! And now some gifts for you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: (+25% Convert Rate) (+25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest) and (+10% Blue Field Capacity!) Hope that helps! Merry blue Beesmas!

Bucko Bee better not use that Snow Machine! It's TOO DANG COLD!
-Present Given-
NUH-UH! You didn’t! You DID! Let me open it, let me open it! ...(krumple krumple)...Whaaat? It’s a !!!! How on earth did you afford this? Do you realize how rare these are? We’ve only got 1 in the whole HQ! Man, now I feel silly. I got you a gift too, but it’s not even in the same league. Hope you’ll like it anyways. It includes the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you’ll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose and Mushroom Field and +10% Pollen from Flames! Merry Beesmas! Now if you’ll excuse me, I’ve gotta setup my bPad, oh boy oh boy.

You beekeepers are funny with your seasonal traditions.
-Present Given-
I won't judge though. We all move to our own beat. So, let's see what you've brought me. ...(krumple krumple)... It's a gamelan! A traditional Indonesian percussive instrument. I've always appreciated the far-out hypnotic beats you can accomplish with these things. I really appreciate it and I'll put it to good use. But that'll have to wait.

A beekeeper approaches, Gummy Bee!
-If the player does not meet the requirements-
A box wrapped in colorful paper... a gift? You believe you're worthy of exchanging gifts with US? HAH We do not accept trifles from meager meat-based civilians. Prove yourself by completing our quest and we may reconsider.
-If the player has completed his quest-
What is that in your two hands, Gummy Soldier? A customary delivery... A gesture of GOO-d will. Gummy Bee and I permit you to open it for us. ...(krumple krumple)... OH! You've brought live ammunition. A case of hand GOO-nades! How explosively sweet. I will put these to good use gumming up a village or two. KABOOM! In exchange, my gooey grunt, I give you this: The ! Let it serve as a constant reminder that better days WILL COME. And the unbearably bitter and salty states of all worlds will give way to a SWEET future. ALL worlds will be GOOnited when Gummy Bee and I are through. And with that ornament on your wooden plant, you'll receive the following boosts to aid in our GOO CRUCADE. +10% Capacity +25% Coconut Field Capacity +1% Critical Chance And +10% Goo! Now go GOO UP the pathetic Beesmas festivities once and for all!

😐
-If the player does not meet the requirements-
Ooooh... uh... Ok, well. Yeah, first, thanks. But uhhh no thanks. No. Just no. I mean, er... I'm the one whose supposed to make you give the gifts. You give them out, you spread that Beesmas cheer, that's on you. And, right. Ok so you're doing that now, but don't do it to me. I don't need gifts, like - What's the point? What? Have you given a present to everyone else yet?? Huh? Huh?? Huh? ... I didn;'t; think so
-If the player has delivered everyone a present-
Wow... so you're really out of characters to give presents too ... Kind of suspicious Not going to lie. I mean, uhhhhhhhhhh Thaaaaaaaanks... Friend... Just, er, could you open it for me I don't really have a body ...(krumple krumple)... Oh, it's a, it's a $10 Roblox gift card. I've never played ROBLOX. I'm a man, not a baby. I mean uh - I mean - that came out kind of mean... You're not a baby. You're, uh.. you're Bee Bear's special helper (cough) And thanks to you and your cool bee swarm™, everyone got a cool present this year. And uh, yeah. I guess the spirit of Beesmas is, it's a good thing right ... So, like, do you want this gift card? Actually wait, no I'll... I'm going to sell it... sorry, but thanks. Bye.

🎵Walking in a winter wonderlaaand... (Sigh)
-Present Given-
Well, it's Beesmas again! We do it every year now. You know, Beesmas isn't originally a Bee Swarm thing. It was started out by Mah_Bucket and zKevin, out of their love for Bubble Bee Man presumably. Bee Swarm Simulator was involved in their 2018 Beesmas event. After that, it sort of became part of the Bee Swarm Sim lore too. It's convenient, because it references a real holiday without being too specific. For example, it doesn't matter if we celebrate Beesmas after the real Christmas. I mean, whose to say Beesmas doesn't actually take place in February, right? Hmm... Yeah OK... Anyways, what did you and Bee Bear bring me this year? ...(krumple krumple)... Wow! A whole basket of Korean skin care products! As I get older, skin care becomes more and more important. This is perfect! Remember to always wear sunscreen, even in the dead of winter. OK, now your gifts. The ! And some less important stuff. With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate; +25% Capacity on the Mountain Top Field; and +20% Pollen from Tools! Keep collecting  to get the most out of this year's Honeyday event! Now I'll get back to singing while you get back to making honey. Merry Beesmas!

Mmmm...mhmm...(she's murmuring to herself with her eyes close)...
-Present Given-
I've been counting  all day as they fall onto the fields. (Yawn). Oh, it's quite hypnotic! I keep losing count because, well, it's like counting sheep. At one point, though, I counted. What was it... Over 50 ? I lost count that time because of a Snow Storm. I mean, I can't keep up with that. ... Snow everywhere, like frosting on our Beesmas cake! Decorated with all those delightful contraptions this year. Like that wreath. Hehehh, Black Bear, bless his heart. Look at that Honey Wreath. I won't say more... Oh but Mother Bear's Gingerbread House! Oh, I like that one. ...(she's staring into the distance)... Is that a ? Or... Hmm. I'm tired of counting. I'm bored now. Why bother with something so mundane, in the most exciting time of the year! Bee Bear, oh that precious fool. Don't tell him I called him a fool. Not that he would mind. To think that we mere mortal bears could offend a honeyday deity. Anyways, that sweet, jovial bear, he brightens up the entire mountain in the darkest days of the year. How did we even make it through the winters before him? Well, I mean, I do remember... It wasn't so bad. We just celebrated, we just didn't focus so much on the bees. Not that you bees don't deserve it! Bee Bear is completely right about that. We celebrated the passing of the year in a more general sense. We still ate a lot of the same food, did similar customs, it just felt a little more... off the cusp. We still put ornaments on a tree, you see, we just didn't have a special name for it. Or did we? Hmmm... Was it... Oh, like I'll ever remember. Mother always had a tree, and we dolled it up for winter. Left it up much longer than we probably should have, we were never... punctual. But it was always so, so full of ornaments! Everyone was jealous of our tree. Perhaps the only time our hoarding tendencies were a source of envy. Hah! And things really took off as Beesmas became more and more of a thing. Mother couldn't help herself, any time she saw an ornament on sale. Mmhmm. And some of those - completely unnecessary, Mother. The only thing more imposing than our tree was the size of our debt. How did we even get approved for so many credit cards? Yaach... But it was worth it. You can't put a price on Beesmas Magic. Well, you can, sort of. Just take a look on Bee Bear's Catalog. But you understand what I mean. Those debts are long gone, and here I am countless years later and still reminiscing about our trees. Mother's taste for ornaments - they were well considered. ...(she's staring off into the distance)... ...31... Or was it? Drats. I've lost count again. I can't help myself! I just see the  and I just start... But it's too hard! And it's boring. Let's do something else. What have you come to see me about, anyhow, dear? What's that you're holding - it's for me? Oh! A gift! Will you open it for Spirit Bear? My hands are full, you know. And sore. ...(You open the present for Spirit Bear)... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh no! Oh no no no! This - this is just too much! It's a Baby  Ornament! From the outer space show! Everyone's favorite little green alien, the tiny space wizard, in a replica of his floating crib. It's so cute I could cry! Thank you, dear, thank you! This is going on the top of my tree next year, the very top is where little  belongs. ... ..(she's staring off into the distance)... Mmhmm, the very top. ... OK, goodbye now. ... Oh! YOUR gift! Yes yes I have one for you! A few things, actually. Including my ! With that on the tree, well, I don't quite recall what it does. You can check the tree yourself. (Yawn). First, why not check out that strange  in the Dandelion Field. Merry Beesmas, dear!

Bzz zzz zzuh...
-Present Given-
Bzzz buz ZZ! ZZZZZ BZZ BZZZZ!!! ...(krumple krumple)... (You open up the  for Honey Bee) (The box is filled to the brim with honey) BUZZZZZZZUH BZZZZZZZ! Bzz zz zz! (Honey Bee's eye open wide with joy) (You can tell it's very grateful) Bzzzz zzz buzz bz BUZ zz. (Honey Bee pulls out a plastic bag full of honey) (Inside floats a crude plastic figurine of Honey Bee) Zzzz! (You can sense that with this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts:) (+10% Convert Rate) (+10% Capacity) (+5% Mark Duration) (And +10% Honey From Tokens) Bzz zuh Buzz buzz BuzzZuhz (Honey Bee smiles warmly)

I'm just happy it's Winter.
-Present Given-
Wait, don't tell me you've brought a ? Of all the beekeepers I've met, you really are the coolest! One second, let me just try to unwrap this with my wings somehow... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh, it's a  Beequip! Well, this is a little awkward... Bucko Bees can't equip . But don't worry. I've got plenty of blue bee friends here at the HQ who will make great use out of this! Thanks! And now some gifts for you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: (+25% Convert Rate) (+25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest) and (+10% Blue Field Capacity!) Hope that helps! Merry blue Beesmas!

Bucko Bee better not use that Snow Machine! It's TOO DANG COLD!
-Present Given-
NUH-UH! You didn't! You DID! Let me open it, let me open it! ...(krumple krumple)... OH. MY. GOSH! It's a bPad Air!, 4th generation!!! The newest model! Bubble Bee Man must have gotten my letter this year. He went all out! I can use this to play ROBLOX, and Bee Swarm Simulator! Man, now I feel silly. I got you a gift too, but it's not even in the same league. Hope you'll like it anyways. It includes the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts: (+25% Convert Rate) (+25% Capacity in the Rose and Mushroom Forest) and (+10% Pollen from Flames!) Merry Beesmas! Now if you'll excuse me, I've gotta set up my bPad, oh boy oh boy.

You beekeepers are funny with your seasonal traditions.
-Present Given-
If you're having a tough year, remember things'll get better. Life is full of ups and downs. It's a bumpy ride, just gotta hang on tight. So, what did you bring me? ...(krumple krumple)... Hah! It's a wind-up "Get Stick Bugged" figurine. Yeah, of course I like that meme. Feels good to force even the non-beekeepers to hear my song when they least expect it. Speaking of, you better put this  on the tree fast.

A beekeeper approaches, Gummy Bee!
-If the player does not meet the requirements-
A box wrapped in colorful paper... a gift? You believe you're worthy of exchanging gifts with US? HAH We do not accept trifles from lowly MEATY FEET creatures. Prove yourself and we may reconsider.
-Present Given-
What is that in your two hands, Gummy Soldier? A customary delivery... A gesture of GOO-d will. Gummy Bee and I will permit you to open it for us. ...(krumple krumple)... OH! You've brought live ammunition. A case of hand GOO-nades! How EXPLOSIVELY sweet. I will put these to good use gumming up a village or two. KABOOM! In exchange, my gooey grunt, I give you this: The ! Let it serve as a constant reminder that better days WILL COME. And the unbearably bitter and salty status of all worlds will give way to a SWEET future. ALL worlds will be GOOnited when Gummy Bee and I are through. And with that ornament on your wooden plant, you'll receive the following boosts to aid in our GOO CRUCADE. +10% Capacity +25% Coconut Field Capacity +1% Critical Chance And +10% Goo! Now go GOO UP the pathetic Beesmas festivities once and for all!

Err... um..
-Present Given-
Look, I'll ONLY take this if you've already given one to everyone else. Like, the whole point of Beesmas is that I'm giving gifts to others... Err.. Well, I'm using other people, to give gifts to the bees. No... I'm... I'm not using anyone, it's not like that. Bee Bear and I have a job (?) Basically, get other people to give gifts to eachother (??) That's the "spirit" of Beesmas. Right? Right? Right? Uhh... Oh.. you did give a  to everyone else? OK fine. I'll take this one then. ...(krumple krumple)... What is... is this a joke? Do you think this is funny? Is Beesmas some sort of joke to you? Look - we don't have to agree on everything, but Beesmas is like, my beliefs OK? And we are all entitled to our own beliefs, and we should all respect one another. Like, why would you even give this to me? Seriously, are you daft? Stuff like this is why you're on the Naughty List. Just... just take your rewards and get out of here. I would say Merry Beesmas, but why bother? ... Sorry... I guess I... overreacted a little... But, umm... Let's just leave it at that.

Dialogue.Dialogue:
Oh, hello there!
-Present Given-
For me? You shouldn't have! Let's see what it is... Oh, a jar of honey imported from the tropics! I can taste distinct notes of banana and mango. Delicious! You know me too well. I've got you a little something as well. Merry Beemas!"

What's up, bud?
-Present Given-
Ah, of course! Time to exchange some Beesmas gifts. Let me see what you got me this year... Whoa! A 1 year subscription to Bearmazon Prime! I'll get so much out of this, you have NO idea! Thanks buddy. Here's a little something I know you'll love as well.

There is nothing more magical than Beesmas!
-Present Given-
Ooooh! What a wonderful surprise! What could it possibly be? Aww! A lovely framed photo of me and my cubs. How incredibly sweet of you! Well now, I've got something for you as well. You didn't expect me to forget my favorite beekeeper on Beesmas, did you?

What?
-Present Given-
Oh yeah, Beesmas. What've you got here. ... WOW, an automatic monster respawn timer! Sends a notification every time the Werewolf respawns. That's a Beesmas gift I'll actually use. Thanks, I appreciate it. Oh, and here's something for you. Now let's get back to work. The bugs don't break for Beesmas.

Enjoying the lights I strung up?
-Present Given-
Ah yes, a Beesmas Gift! I'll have you know I'm hard to impress. Let's see... Oh! A textbook documenting rare, peculiar, and endangered languages! Oh look, unspoken language too: smoke signals, sign language, Silbo Gomero... This may offer some valuable insights that'll help forward my Translator project! Thank you very much. And here's something for you too, of course!

My cousin's something else, isn't he?
-Present Given-
Look, I love the winter. Cool and comfortable. But don't get me started on Beesmas. If you grew up with up my family, you'd be sick of it too. Bee Bear's not magical. He's a polar bear in a bee suit. But he brings me something delicious every year, so I can't complain. What did he whip up this time? Oooh yeahh! A 12 pack of frozen truffle and sharp cheddar mac-and-cheese meals! I'll heat some up right now, you and your bees have to try this. It's my favorite. ...(beep beep)... ...(szzzzzzzzzzz)... ...(DING)... Mmmmm, delicious! Everyone's got their quirks, you know. At the end of the day, Bee Bear is still a nice guy. Here, I've prepared something special for you too. Happy Honeydays!

The heck is Beesmas? A friend of mine on Roblox named Younite messaged me a few weeks ago, His friend Mah_Bucket has apparently been hosting a bee-themed Christmas event on Roblox for years! I couldn't say no! Seriously, it's called "Beesmas" and just look at this game. And when they showed me Bubble Bee Man I was in awe. But I don't have a good track record with getting out fast updates... I'm already late... It was only recently that I realized I've been twisting this lid the wrong way for months. So here we are, hope this cuts it for now. I'll need to do something again next week to close out the holidays.
-Present Given-
Ooooo I wonder what this could be! lol Wow! A hastily drawn icon of a Christmas present! Thanks a lot. But you know what I really want? To go on vacation in January and not think about bees for a whole month. I’ve got some more lid-related things to attend to first. Here’s your secret reward for gifting a  to me!"

Can't stand this cold! You know us here at the Red HQ - we're all about that HEAT! But you know what, I'd be lying if I said it didn't look pretty.
-Present Given-
GET OUT!!!!!! Awee, see, I was right when I took you to be a fine beekeeper. And a good person too! So what'd you get me?? ... RIGHT ON! It's a strawberry scented air freshener! The kind you hang on the reer  view mirror of a car. I don't have a car, and I can't smell it very well out here... BUT I LOVE IT! Here, here - this is for you. MERRY BEESMAS from the Red Bees at the Red Headquarters!

The cool, calm spirit of winter of reflects the nature of us blue bees. Still yet thoughtful. Calm and steady. That's what gives us our edge.
-Present Given-
Hah hah, of course you'd do this. Surprise me with a Present out of the blue! You're a stand up beekeeper, you know that? Let me just open this thing up... ...(krumple krumple)... Nice! Some tickets to see the Blue Bee Group in Vegas. Not sure how I'll get there or when I'll find the time to go, But it doesn't look like they expire. Now's your turn! A little something from all us Blue Bees at the HQ.

Beesmas is just another day. Like any other day, it's a day to boogie. Holidays come and go. They blow past me like leaves in the wind until they crumble away. But me and my nymphs, we've been dancing forever. Heh heh.
-Present Given-
You're full of surprises, flesh-bug. Let's take a look in the box. A reel-to-reel machine? How did you fit this in there? Very cool. Let me set this up. ... Now let's give it a whirl.

Dialogue.Dialogue:
Oh, hello there!
-Present Given-
What've you gotten me this year? I'll bet it's something special. ...(krumple krumple)... Wow! A honey-straw! A straw made specifically for drinking honey. I've heard so much about these. Somehow they get a lot mroe honey up in a lot less time. Thank you so much! Now here's your present: the ! With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate+25% Capacity in the Sunflower Fieldand +5% Honey Per Pollen!Enjoy! And Happy Honeydays!

The Honeydays bring the bees so much joy!
--Present Given-
Oh! Is this for me? How very sweet of you! Ill open it right now! ....(krumple krumple)... Aww! It's an evil little Snow Cub plushie! That Snow Cub is always getting up to no good, isn't it. If he were MY cub. Well, he'd probably be just as bad. I'm such a push over. Now go ahead and open up what i got for you! It's the ! With this on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Strawberry Field And +10% Pollen from Bee Gathering! Merry Beesmas! I hope your hive enjoys that!

Brrrr, it's cold!
-Present Given-
But not too cold for us to exchange gifts! So what's it, huh? What'd you get ol' Brown Bear? ...(krumple krumple)... Whoa! It's a Bwhoop health-tracking wrist band! It lets you know when your Royal Jelly levels are too low. And when your quest-stressing levels are too high! Thanks bud, this should be good for my health. Now look what i got you! The ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate. +25% Capacity in the Clover Field, and +20% Pollen from "Bomb" abilities! I'm gonna go calibrate this thing, Happy Beesmas!

Hmm...
-Present Given-
Even though I'm on guard, I'm still open to gifts. ...(krumple krumple)... WHOA! It's a Monster-Slay Offline Voucher! Onett told me he would NEVER add one of these things. Said we'd probably never see any of you again! Guess it slipped through the cracks. Thanks. Now you take this: the . With that on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate. +25% Capacity in the Bamboo Field, and +5% Bee Attack Power! Stay safe out there, and Merry Beesmas.

Keeping busy on Beesmas, just like me, I presume.
-Present Given-
Ah, busy getting me a gift I see! Let's get to the inspection. ...(krumple krumple)... Fascinating! This is a Beebini Honeycincincinappannini! A creature designed by an artificial intelligence no bear can comprehend. It appears to be half bee, and half panini. A miracle of science, to be sure. I'm not counting this as a bee discovery, though. Now it's your turn! I got you the  ornament! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Pineapple Patch And +25% Convert Rate at the Hive! That ought to help make this Beesmas productive. Thanks again for all your help. Happy Honeydays! Now you'll excuse me, I'm going to take a DNA sample of this thing.

It's good time of year  to be a polar bear!
-Present Given-
Especially for my cousin, Bee Bear. His entire identity is centered around Beesmas. At first our family thought it was weird, but we've become supportive over the years. Beesmas brings Bee Bear joy and gives him a sense of purpose. Who are we to judge? We all have our quirks. Me, I'm obsessed with cooking. So I hope you brought a cooking related gift! Come on, let's see what you brought. ...(krumple krumple)... Oh wow! A $50 gift card to Bearawhon! Don't know how far that'll go at such an expensive grocery store... Might get me a half pint of , or a single . But I appreciate it! Now, go ahead and open yours. It's  Ornament! With this on the tree, you'll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Pumpkin Patch And +10% White Field Capacity! Hope that helps you complete my cousins  crazy quests! Happy Honeydays!

You're free to warm yourself up in my shop.
-Present Given-
A  for me? What, do you like me or something? Well I hope so, cause I think quite highly of you. Let's see what you think I'd like. ...(krumple krumple)... Ah! A Sticker Book with all 400 slots unlocked! That must have cost a ton of . And for what? A little convenience? Heh, well, a little convenience goes a long way with me. Thank you. Now for you: It's the . It's filled with flowers and leaves I grew in my Planters. The fragrance is pretty strong... but hey, smells like Beesmas. With this on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Dandelion Field And +5% Nectar. I hope you'll get some use out of that. Because I've already got enough stickers to get use out of mine!

Is it snowing? I can't tell from in this... cave..
-Present Given-
A  for me? Wow, thanks! Ok, let's see what it is. ...(krumple krumple)... Wow!! Some cough drops! Just what I needed. If this is because you've heard my voice crack... Well, I can explain. It does that when I'm tired and I've been talking a lot. A little embarrassing. But these will help! Ok, now look at what I made just for you... and everyone else who gives me a . It's the ! With this on the Beesmas tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity on the Mountain Top Field and +20% Pollen from Tools! Oh, and some other things. Like the boosts you probably actually wanted. Merry Beesmas and Happy Happy Honeymaking!

Mmmm...mhmm...(she's murmuring to herself with her eyes close )...
-Present Given-
nil

(click click click click click)
-Present Given-
CHARITABLE GIFT DETECTED I am shocked and I am thankful and I will open this package now. >> Commencing Unwrapping Sequence ...(krumple krumple)... I've been gifted 32GB OF DDR5 RAM! With this, I'll be able to generate challenge rounds approximately 0.389% faster! I gladly accept this and offer you this in return: the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +10% Capacity +25% Capacity in the Spider Field +10% Pollen from Event Bees And +5% Pollen from Duped Abilities! >> GIFT EXCHANGE SEQUENCE COMPLETE: OUTCOME SUCCESS

I should have built a roof like Bucko Bee...
-Present Given-
WHAT! A GIFT? No way! Youuuuuuuu Well hand it over! Come on! ...(krumple krumple)... WHAT IS THIS????? I DIDN'T EVEN KNOW THEY EXISTED!! A 20% Red Pollen Hive Bonus Poinsettia!!! This is going to skyrocket the Red HQ into astronomical levels of wealth! Thank you thank you thank you! Now, mine's not quite that fancy, but here it is: It's the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose and Mushroom Field and +10% Pollen from Flames! Now to go look up what I could get for this thing I mean... to equip it and use it to it's  fullest potential.

Looks chilly out there!
-Present Given-
Well, if it isn't the coolest beekeeper around! You bringing me a  makes you even cooler. Let's see what it is... ...(krumple krumple)... Well I'll be! A whole jar of marbles! Man... that's a lot of marbles. Some pretty cool ones in there. I see one that kind of looks like a . That's neat. Can't wait to crack this open and roll those bad boys around. Thanks. You're truly cool. Take this, why don't you: The ! With that on the Beesmas tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest and +10% Blue Field Capacity! Hope that helps your Blue Beesmas dreams come true!

You beekeepers are funny with your seasonal traditions.
-Present Given-
They keep me entertained for sure. Now, let's see what you've lugged up onto this mushroom. ...(krumple krumple)... Oh wow, a xylophone! Those signature playful percussive notes hit you right in the funny bone. I'll make some really funky music with this. Thank you flesh-bug! Now take this: it's a . With that on the tree, you'll receive the following buffs: +25% Convert Rate... +25% Capacity on the Cactus Field and Pepper Patch... And +5% Gifted Bee Pollen. Hope you find it useful. But first, let's dance.

Bzzz zzz zzuh...
-Present Given-
Bzzz buz ZZ! ZZZZZ BZZ BZZZZ!!! ...(krumple krumple)... (You open up the  for Honey Bee) (The box is filled to the brim with honey) BUZZZZZZZUH BZZZZZZZ! Bzz zz zz! (Honey Bee's eye  open wide with joy) (You can tell it's very grateful) Bzzzz zzz buzz bz BUZ zz. (Honey Bee pulls out a platic  bag full of honey) (Inside floats a crude plastic figurine of Honey Bee) Zzzz! (You can sense that with this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts:) (+25% Convert Rate) (+10% Epic Bee Pollen) (+10% Honey From Tokens) (And +1% Honey Per Goo!) Bzz zuh Buzz buzz BuzzZuhz (Honey Bee eyes your honey meter madly) (You can sense it wants to cash in the IOU immediately)

A beekeeper approaches, Gummy Bee!
-If the player does not meet the requirements-
A box wrapped in colorful paper... a gift? You believe you're worthy of exchanging gifts with US? HAH We do not accept trifles from meager meat-based civilians. Prove yourself by completing our quest and we may reconsider.
-If the player meets the requirements-
What is that in your two hands, Gummy Soldier? A customary delivery... A gesture of GOO-d will. Gummy Bee and I permit you to open it for us. ...(krumple krumple)... OH! You've brought live ammunition. A case of hand GOO-nades! How EXPLOSIVELY sweet. I will put these to good use gumming up a village or two. KABOOM! In exchange, my gooey grunt, I give you this: The ! Let it serve as a constant reminder that better days WILL COME. And the unbearably bitter and salty states of all worlds will give way to a SWEET future. ALL worlds will be GOOnited when Gummy Bee and I are through. And with that ornament on your wooden plant, you'll receive the following boosts to aid in our GOO CRUCADE . +10% Capacity +25% Coconut Field Capacity +1% Super-Crit Chance And +10% GOO! Now go GOO UP the pathetic Beesmas festivities once and for all!

Dialogue.Dialogue: Buzzuh bz bzz bzz. BUZZ bzz bz. Bzzzuh? (Gifted Bucko Bee is speaking buzzes) You are given a choice to use a translator or to leave. You leave. Bzzh zz zz.

Buzzuh bz bzz bzz. BUZZ bzz bz. Bzzzuh? (Gifted Bucko Bee is speaking buzzes) You are given a choice to use a translator or to leave. You use a translator. What's this? Hmm, amazing... A device that lets me talk to beekeepers... Well then, let me introduce myself! I'm Bucko Bee - Leader of the Blue Bees! And this is the Blue Headquarters. Here, the Blue Bees and I are constantly working... Thinking, planning, honing our skills... Doing everything we can to advance the Blue cause. We've discovered a method to boost the blue fields. We've developed highly advanced Blue Guards. That's what sets us apart - why we're always one step ahead of the Red Bees! I see you've discovered quite a few Blue Bees. Seem to have some great Blue potential. But you'll need some training if you're hoping to rank up to a Blue Master. Complete my quests, and I'll reward you with some . Those can be used to boost your blue pollen collection... Or to craft some of the equipment we've developed in house. Each time you complete one of my quests, they'll become more challenging. To make it worth your effort, you'll be rewarded a bonus after every 5. What do you say? Ready to start? Talk to me again, and we'll dive right in.

Brave, Bold, Blue. It's time for another blue-themed quest. Complete it, and you'll be another step closer to realizing your True Blue potential! I'll also reward you with a .  boost blue pollen by x1.25 for 10 minutes. They're also used as materials for making advanced blue equipment. After every 5th quest, I'll reward you a bonus. And after certain milestones, the bonus may be truly brilliant. I've loaded the next quest into your Quest Menu. Report back when it's complete.
-During-
My quests becoming progressively more challenging. There's no end to this fight - we just keep moving. It's this ongoing work that gives us an edge over other bees. Do you have what it takes to become True Blue? Complete my quests to prove it.
-Completion-
Beautiful work! You've earned yourself a . But there's no time to rest. Blue Bees are constantly working, striving... That's what gives us an edge over the Red Bees. Keep moving forward, into the blue.

The cool, calm spirit of winter reflects the nature of us Blue Bees. Still yet thoughtful. Calm and steady. That's what gives us our edge. You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Bucko Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present.Hah hah, of course you'd do this. Suprise  me with a  out of the blue! You're a stand up beekeeper, you know that? Let me just open this thing up... ...(krumple krumple)... Nice! Some ticket to see the Blue Bee Group in Vegas. Not sure how I'll get there or when I'll find the time to go, But it doesn't look like they expire. Now's your turn! A little something from all us Blue Bees at the HQ.

I'm just happy it's Winter. You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Bucko Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present. Wait, don't tell me you've brought a ? Of all the beekeepers I've met, you really are the coolest! One second, let me just try to unwrap this with my wings somehow... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh, it's a  Beequip! Well, this is a little awkward... Bucko Bees can't equip ,. But don't worry. I've got plenty of blue bee friends here at the HQ who will make great use out of this! Thanks! And now some gifts for you, including the ! With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest and +10% Blue Field Capacity! Hope that helps! Merry blue Beesmas!

I'm just happy it's Winter. You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Bucko Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present. Wait, don't tell me you've brought a ? Of all the beekeepers I've met, you really are the coolest! One second, let me just try to unwrap this with my wings somehow... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh, it's a  Beequip! Well, this is a little awkward... Bucko Bees can't equip . But don't worry. I've got plenty of blue bee friends here at the HQ who will make great use out of this! Thanks! And now some gifts for you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: (+25% Convert Rate) (+25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest) and (+10% Blue Field Capacity!) Hope that helps! Merry blue Beesmas!

I'm just happy it's Winter. You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Bucko Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present. Well, if it isn't the coolest Beekeeper around! You bringing me a  makes you even cooler. Let's see what it is... ...(krumple krumple)... Well I'll be! An entire gallon of Comforting Nectar! No wonder that thing was so heavy. Soo... I happened to get you some Comforting Nectar as well.. That's just part of my gift though, so this isn't too awkward. The most important part is the ! With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest and +10% Blue Field Capacity! Thanks for the nectar. Have a merry blue Beesmas!

Look at all that beautiful snow! You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Bucko Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present. You brought me a present? Now that's what I call cool. I'll go ahead and open it up! ...(krumple krumple)... What is this thing? Oh, an automatic bubble blower! Wow, with one of these, my boosts will be better than ever! We might just break the Pop Star record with this. Guess I don't need any Bubble or Tadpole Bees around anymore! Just kidding, haha. Thanks for the thoughtful gift! I also got you something: the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest and +15% Pollen from Bubbles! Enjoy it! And have a merry blue Beesmas!

Looks chilly out there! You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Bucko Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give him a present. Wait, don't tell me you've brought a ? Of all the beekeepers I've met, you really are the coolest! One second, let me just try to unwrap this with my wings somehow... ...(krumple krumple)... What's this? Oooh, it's a jigsaw puzzle! Looks like it's supposed to be a picture of the ocean against a blue sky. Man, that's a lot of blue... might be tricky. I'll try my best! Thanks! And now some gifts for you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest and +15% Pollen from Bubbles! Hope that helps! Merry blue Beesmas!

I see one that kind of looks like a . That's neat. Can't wait to crack this open and roll those bad boys around. Thanks. You're truly cool. Take this, why don't you: The ! Beesmas Quest - Bucko Bee's Snow Machine.Dialogue:
Winter is when Blue Bees truly excel. We crave the crisp, cool air. We thrive in the soothing snow. But sometimes winters are just a bit too mild for our liking. That's why this year, we're giving nature a helping hand. With this Snow Machine, we'll be able to summon Snow Storms on command! Unfortunately, construction is still under way. If you and your swarm pitch in, we should have it operational in no time. Time to paint this Beesmas white and blue.

-During-
N/A

-Completion-
Beautiful! The Snow Machine is just about ready to go. Just a few more adjustments and... It's online! Now that's cool. Other quests.Dialogue:
Egg Hunts are all about the thrill of hunting for hidden stuff, And the excitement that comes with a stroke of luck. When us bees at the Blue HQ were told to come up with an Egg Hunt quest... We knew exactly what to do. Keep it simple. Keep it cool. But simple doesn't have to be easy! For our quest, we want you to hunt for a bunch of different tokens. Nothing else. Just token hunting, to really capture that traditional thrill. We put together a brilliant basket for you when you're done. As a heads up, you might want to make room for .
-During- 
Some tokens are pretty obscure.  tokens,  tokens, you'll probably need to get those from mobs. The rest will show up eventually. You know how it is.
-Completion- 
Look at all those beautiful tokens. We really put the hunt in Egg Hunt, didn't we? Well then, like I said, we've got something special for you. Just think of me as your own personal Beeaster Bunny!

Other quests.Dialogue:
Nothing clears one's mind more than a serene landscape covered in snow. Cool everything down and helps silence noise. Literally and figuratively. Winter is definitely the season of choice for the cool, calm, collected Blue Bees. This year, we've got a perfect idea for an  that'll celebrate winter. But we'll need your help to finish it, here's what you've got to do: Collect 250,000,000 Blue pollen... Collect 100,000,000 Blue pollen from the Cactus Field... Collect 500 Blueberry Tokens... Defeat 25 Mantises... Defeat 10 Army Ants... And use Blue Field Booster 5 times.
-During-
N/A
-Completion-
Beautiful work out there! Now I can wrap this up... ...(Snip snip snip)... ...(Knock knock knock)... Here we are: The ! The perfect representation of the Blue Bees' love for winter. It's even got the face of a Frosty Bee. Snowmen are a classic icon of Beesmas, At least they have been ever since that cartoon came out in the 60s. With this  on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +10% Capacity; x1.1 Blue Pollen; x1.25 Pollen from the Blue Flower Field; And x1.25 Pollen from the Pine Tree Forest! Can't wait to see Riley Bee's face when you put that on the tree. Merry Beesmas and happy new year!

Dialogue.Dialogue:
Oh, hello there!
-Present Given-
A present for me? How thoughtful! I wonder what it could be... ...(krumple krumple)... Wow! It's a Vicious Bee themed back scratcher! The prongs look like . Yikes! I've never been a fan of Vicious Bee. It's straight up scary and rude. But my arms are pretty short, so this will really come in handy. Thanks! I've got gifts for you as well! Including the ! With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Sunflower Field and +5% Honey Per Pollen! This should help your honeymaking this Beesmas! Happy Honeydays!

The Honeydays bring the bees so much joy!
-Present Given-
What's this! Oooh you shouldn't have! Now let's see what you got me. ...(krumple krumple)... Ohhh! It's a little pendant necklace! Just what could be inside? ...(click)... Aww! It's a picture of my cubs having fun at camp! Boy do I miss them. This'll help though! Thank you so much! I've got some presents for you as well, including the ! With that on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Strawberry Field and +10% Pollen from Bee Gathering! Make sure to cherish the time with your bees this Beesmas! That's what it's all about!

Brrrr, it's cold!
-Present Given-
But not too cold for us to exchange gifts! So what is it, huh? What'd you get ol'
Brown Bear? ...(krumple krumple)... Whoa! A 12 month subscription to ChatGPBee! Not sure exactly how I'll use this, but I'll try it out! Maybe it can come up with quests to give you. Or maybe it can just keep me company. Thanks bud! Now look at what I got you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Clover Field And +20% Pollen from "Bomb" abilities! Happy Beesmas!

Hmm...
-Present Given-
A gift? Oh, that's kind of you. I'll open it now. ...(krumple krumple)... WHOA! It's 5 ! With these, I can instantly gain Invigorating Nectar to temporarily boost my attack power. Thanks! Well I can't take something without giving you something back. I got you a few gifts, including the . With that on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Bamboo Field And +5% Bee Attack Power! Stay safe out there, and Merry Beesmas.

Beesmas is amazing! But it sure keeps us busy.
-Present Given-
Oh, of course! Time to exchange our gifts. Let’s see what you’ve brought me... Fascinating! It's a 3D Printer! Imagine all the useful tools I'll be able to make with this. Like, hmm... I'll come up with some. Anyways, now for your gift: the  ornament! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you’ll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Pineapple Patch And +25% Convert Rate at the Hive! That ought to help make this Beesmas productive. Thanks again for all your help. Happy Honeydays!

I'm just happy it's winter.
-Present Given-
My cousin Bee Bear's entire identity is centered around Beesmas. At first our family thought it was weird, but we've become supportive over the years. Beesmas brings Bee Bear joy and gives him a sense of purpose. Who are we to judge? We all have our quirks. Me, I'm obsessed with cooking. So I hope you brought a cooking related gift! Come on, let me see what you brought. ...(krumple krumple)... Niiiice! An air fryer! I've been wanting one of these for ages. This can crisp up some stuff fast, and'll let me cut back on . Now for your gift! The  Ornament! With this on the tree, you'll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate And +3% Pollen from Colorless Bees! Works for their gathering and abilities! Well, good luck on the rest of your Bee Bear quests. Merry Beesmas!

You're free to warm yourself up in my shop.
-Present Given-
Somehow I knew you'd get something for me this year. We're on the same page. I've been thinking about you too. I'll go ahead and open my gift now. ...(krumple krumple)... Ah, cool! An incense stand. I've been wanting to spruce up the aromatics of my shop. The sweet, woody notes of incense might be a perfect fit. Thank you! Now, I just so happened to get you something fragrant as well:  the . It's filled with flowers and leaves I grew in my Planters. Smells like Beesmas! With this on the tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Dandelion Field And +5% Nectar. Hope you like it. Happy Honeydays!

Is it snowing? I can't tell from in this... cave..
-Present Given-
A  for me? I'll try to act surprised! Oh boy, here I go opening it... ...(krumple krumple)... Nice! It's the bottle of sublingual melatonin tablets that I totally didn't order for myself! You know, in some parts of the world this stuff is difficult to get. RX, even. Crazy, right? Cause I can't sleep without it. Anyways, thanks! And here's my gift to you: Bringing Beesmas back this December when I said I wouldn't, and actually having the holiday-themed update overlap with Christmas. ... Just kidding! It's the ! With this on the Beesmas tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity on the Mountain Top Field and +20% Pollen from Tools! Hope your Honeydays are full of fun and quality time with those you love. Merry Beesmas!

Mmmm...mhmm...(she's murmuring to herself with her eyes close )...
-Present Given-
I've been counting  all day as they fall onto the fields. (Yawn). Oh, it's quite hypnotic! I keep losing count because, well, it's like counting sheep. At one point, though, I counted. What was it... Over 50 ? I lost count that time because of a Snow Storm. I mean, I can't keep up with that. ... Snow everywhere, like frosting on our Beesmas cake! Decorated with all those delightful contraptions this year. Like that wreath. Hehehh, Black Bear, bless his heart. Look at that Honey Wreath. I won't say more... Oh but Mother Bear's Gingerbread House! Oh, I like that one. ...(she's staring into the distance)... Is that a ? Or... Hmm. I'm tired of counting. I'm bored now. Why bother with something so mundane, in the most exciting time of the year! Bee Bear, oh that precious fool. Don't tell him I called him a fool. Not that he would mind. To think that we mere mortal bears could offend a honeyday deity. Anyways, that sweet, jovial bear, he brightens up the entire mountain in the darkest days of the year. How did we even make it through the winters before him? Well, I mean, I do remember... It wasn't so bad. We just celebrated, we just didn't focus so much on the bees. Not that you bees don't deserve it! Bee Bear is completely right about that. We celebrated the passing of the year in a more general sense. We still ate a lot of the same food, did similar customs, it just felt a little more... off the cusp. We still put ornaments on a tree, you see, we just didn't have a special name for it. Or did we? Hmmm... Was it... Oh, like I'll ever remember. Mother always had a tree, and we dolled it up for winter. Left it up much longer than we probably should have, we were never... punctual. But it was always so, so full of ornaments! Everyone was jealous of our tree. Perhaps the only time our hoarding tendencies were a source of envy. Hah! And things really took off as Beesmas became more and more of a thing. Mother couldn't help herself, any time she saw an ornament on sale. Mmhmm. And some of those - completely unnecessary, Mother. The only thing more imposing than our tree was the size of our debt. How did we even get approved for so many credit cards? Yaach... But it was worth it. You can't put a price on Beesmas Magic. Well, you can, sort of. Just take a look on Bee Bear's Catalog. But you understand what I mean. Those debts are long gone, and here I am countless years later and still reminiscing about our trees. Mother's taste for ornaments - they were well considered. ...(she's staring off into the distance)... ...31... Or was it? Drats. I've lost count again. I can't help myself! I just see the  and I just start... But it's too hard! And it's boring. Let's do something else. What have you come to see me about, anyhow, dear? What's that you're holding - it's for me? Oh! A gift! Will you open it for Spirit Bear? My hands are full, you know. And sore. ...(You open the present for Spirit Bear)... ...(krumple krumple)... Oh no! Oh no no no! This - this is just too much! It's a Windy Bee Bobble Head! So silly! Looks just like you, doesn't it? ... ...(shes  staring off in the distance)... Yes it does. OK, goodbye now. ... Oh! YOUR gift! Yes yes I have one for you! A few things, actually. Including my ! With that on the tree, well, I don't quite recall what it does. You can check the tree yourself. (Yawn). First, why not check out that strange  in the Dandelion Field. Merry Beesmas, dear!

(click click click click click)
-Present Given-
CHARITABLE GIFT DETECTED. I did not foresee this event occurring! >>Commencing Unwrapping Sequence ...(krumple krumple)... I have received: USB C to USB C Cable, Type C 60W (3.1A) Fast Charging Cable (20FT, 2Pack) Compatible with beePhone 16+16 Pro / beePad Mini 6 / beeBook Pro / Beesung S24+S24 Ultra / + More (USB 2.0, Green). I will be able to utilize these. I have many compatible USB C ports. Thank You!  In return, I will grant you this: The ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +10% Capacity +25% Capacity in the Spider Field +10% Pollen from Event Bees and +5% Pollen from Duped Abilities! >> GIFT EXCHANGE SEQUENCE COMPLETE: OUTCOME SUCCESS

I should have built a roof like Bucko Bee...
-Present Given-
NUH-UH! You didn’t! You DID! Let me open it, let me open it! ...(krumple krumple)... Alright! Some rechargeable wing warmers!!! Between these and the candles, I MIGHT be able to make it through this stupid, cold, long winter. Just barely. Thank you!! Now here's your gift: the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you’ll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose and Mushroom Field and +15% Pollen from Flames! Merry Beesmas! Now if you’ll excuse me, I’m gonna go warm up my flappers.

Looks chilly out there!
-Present Given-
Wait, don't tell me you've brought a ? Of all the beekeepers I've met, you really are the coolest! One second, let me just try to unwrap this with my wings somehow... ...(krumple krumple)... What's this? Oooh, it's a jigsaw puzzle! Looks like it's supposed to be a picture of the ocean against a blue sky. Man, that's a lot of blue... might be tricky. I'll try my best! Thanks! And now some gifts for you, including the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Blue Flower Field and Pine Tree Forest and +15% Pollen from Bubbles! Hope that helps! Merry blue Beesmas!

You beekeepers are funny with your seasonal traditions.
-Present Given-
I won't judge though. We all move to our own beat. So, let's see what you've brought me. ...(krumple krumple)... It's a pair of boutique double sided headphones! You know, the major players in the headphones space have been really slacking. Innovative new start-ups run by passionate audiophiles are on the up and up! These have been getting awesome reviews. I'll put them to good use. Now for your gift: it's the . With that on the tree, you'll receive the following buffs: +25% Convert Rate... +25% Capacity on the Cactus Field and Pepper Patch... And +5% Gifted Bee Pollen. But that'll have to wait.

I'm just chilling.
-Present Given-
Really cool of you to think of giving a  to a tourist like me! Guess as long as I'm here, I should participate in the festivities. Well, what'd you get me? ...(krumple krumple)... Haha! It's a Bee Swarm Simulator bumper sticker! This'll go great on the back of my RV. Another fine piece of my traveling memorabilia. And hey, I'm no jerk. Of course I got you something too: It's the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +5% Pollen from Legendary Bees And +5% Ability Token Lifespan! That thing's one of a kind. Consider yourself lucky. I'm glad I stuck around! Merry Beesmas, as they say around here!

Bzz zzz zzuh...
-Present Given-
Bzzz buz ZZ! ZZZZZ BZZ BZZZZ!!! ...(krumple krumple)... (You open up the  for Honey Bee) (The box contains a singular honey token) BUZZZZZZZUH BZZZZZZZ! Bzz zz zz! (Honey Bee's eye  open wide with joy) (You can tell it's very grateful) Bzzzz zzz buzz bz BUZ zz. (Honey Bee pulls out a platic  bag full of honey) (Inside floats a crude plastic figurine of Honey Bee) Zzzz! (You can sense that with this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts:) (+25% Convert Rate) (+10% Epic Bee Pollen) (+10% Honey From Tokens) (And +1% Honey Per Goo) Bzz zuh Buzz buzz BuzzZuhz (Honey Bee smiles warmly)

A beekeeper approaches, Gummy Bee!
-If the player does not meet the requirements-
A box wrapped in colorful paper... a gift? You believe you're worthy of exchanging gifts with US? HAH We do not accept trifles from meager meat-based civilians. Prove yourself by completing our quest and we may reconsider.
-If the player has completed his quest-
What is that in your two hands, Gummy Soldier? A customary delivery... A gesture of GOO-d will. Gummy Bee and I permit you to open it for us. ...(krumple krumple)... AH! A bottle of cannon cleaner! Properly maintaining your Gummy cannon is essential to a successful invasion. We will be putting this to good use! In exchange, my gooey grunt, I give you this: The ! Let it serve as a constant reminder that better days WILL COME. And the unbearably bitter and salty states of all worlds will give way to a SWEET future. All worlds will be GOOnited when Gummy Bee and I are through. And with that ornament on your wooden plant, you'll receive the following boosts to aid in our GOO CRUCADE. +10% Capacity +25% Coconut Field Capacity +1% Super-Crit Chance And +10% GOO! Now go GOO UP the pathetic Beesmas festivities once and for all!

Bub bub bub
-If the player does not meet the requirements-
Ooooh... uh... Ok, well. Yeah, first, thanks. But uhhh no thanks. No. Just no. I mean, er... I'm the one whose supposed to make you give the gifts. You give them out, you spread that Beesmas cheer, that's on you. And, right. Ok so you're doing that now, but don't do it to me. I don't need gifts, like - What's the point? What? Have you given a present to everyone else yet?? Huh? Huh?? Huh? ... I didn;'t;  think so
-If the player has delivered everyone a present-
Huhhhhh you did it. You actally did it You gave a  to everyone else; And now you've got one left over Well ill be an offsale hat the madman. The legend. Good on ya good on y a Nd now its my turn. ...(krumple krumple)... this box contains nothing but 6 mirrors glued to each side I gaze inside the box and see myself from multiple angles i hardly recognize myself,., I wonder if this is really how peopple see me i Question if my left eyes pupil has always had white popping through like that I wonder why my nose consists of so few polygons (cough) I ask myself, why does my skin look like that I ask myself, if im an immortal honeyday god, why do i look so frail i feel it for the first time. The urgency of mortality The horror of corporeal embodiment—that i am only what i see, From a multitude of angles. that each mirror reflects just a small glimpse of that totality/ A totality that I cant deny and I don't know if like that. .. Thank you. This was the greatest gift of all' the gift of self-reflection............. ,..... Sorry, having a moment here .... So take my gift to you its,its the best thing I got it's. Well, just, juest go look at the tree.. And leave myself, alone, with the reflection of me merry besmas

Abilities.col_2: Probability of getting a particular epic bee.

Types and Effects.Name: Jelly Bean Sharing Bonus
Types and Effects.Effect(s): +100% Convert Rate, +10% White Pollen, +10% Red Pollen and +10% Blue Pollen
Types and Effects.Rarity:
N/A (To get this bonus, the player must let another player take a dropped Jelly Bean that the player used)
The length of this boost depends on the amount of jelly beans another player has picked up, eventually capping out at 30 minutes.

Uses.Other Requirements: Donating Cloud Vials to the Wind Shrine.

Unknown_Table.Crafting Ingredients:
2.5T Honey
1,500 Red Extracts
150 Stingers
100 Hard Waxes
50 Caustic Waxes
50 Super Smoothies
3 Invigorating Vials

Unknown_Table.Description: A friendly bee who transforms you into different bears!
A superhero and defender of all things Blue! Together with Crimson Bee it works to unite bees of all colors.
A superhero and defender of all things Red! Together with Cobalt Bee it works to unite bees of all colors.
A virtual bee with malfunctioning AI. It corrupts the game itself.
A jolly bee who loves giving gifts! It's purely motivated by the joy of others.
A squishy bee who's sweet as sugar. Covers flowers in goo to grant you bonus honey!
An entity made of pure light temporarily taking on the form of a bee.
A playful bee who only cares about two things, its tennis ball and you!
This affectionate bee was raised by cats. It becomes a better worker as it warms up to you.
This cold-blooded bee takes great pleasure in inflicting pain.
An ethereal bee as powerful and unpredictable as the weather.

Unknown_Table.Description: The King Beetle Amulet is an amulet with a one in seven (or 14.287%) chance of dropping upon defeating the King Beetle (Loot Luck does not affect the probability or stats).

The Moon Amulet is an amulet created by spending 100 Moon Charms at the Moon Amulet Generator. This amulet gives a few buffs and allows the player to walk on the moon-shaped platforms (located at the back of Dapper Bear’s Shop, in the Diamond Room, and at the 30 Bee Zone Obby) at night.

The Ant Amulet is an amulet that is always obtained from participating in the Ant Challenge.
The amulet gives the player buffs and will always boost Convert Rate. There are five tiers of Ant Amulets, each awarded at a certain amount of points in the Ant Challenge.
Unknown_Table.Source: By participating in the Ant Challenge

Unknown_Table.Description: The Star Amulet is an amulet that can be purchased in five different tiers (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Diamond, and Supreme) from machines in the Star Hall. They grant buffs to the owner and always increase capacity as they go up a tier. Higher tier amulets grant more and better buffs. Diamond and Supreme Star Amulets also have additional Star Passive abilities. The more gifted bee types the player has discovered, the more likely the stats from the Star Amulets will be at maxed value.
The Shell Amulet is an amulet obtainable by defeating the Stump Snail in the Stump Field. Once the player's Stump Snail is defeated, the player is guaranteed to get a Shell Amulet.

The Stick Bug Amulet is an amulet that can be obtained from the Stick Bug Challenge.
In order to obtain these amulets, the player will need to get Stick Bug to a certain level as well as reach a certain score during the Stick Bug Challenge. Stick Bug Amulets will have at least four buffs, with a fifth and sixth possible buff. These buffs can include -% monster respawn time, red or blue bee attack, general bee attack, and bond from battle.

The Cog Amulet is an amulet that can be obtained from the Robo Bear Challenge. In order to obtain these amulets, the player will need to beat certain rounds during the Robo Bear Challenge. The more rounds the player beats, the higher the tier of the Cog Amulet. The average stats of the amulet also scale higher the more cogs you collect in a round.
A parachute you can use to glide down the mountain and reach new places! Press jump while in the air to open.

Floats much faster than the Parachute, allowing you to fly through the sky!
Press jump while in the air to open.

Dialogue.Dialogue:
- Trying to talk -
BzzzzZZz buzz Bzz. Bzz BZZ bz buzzz zz!! (Gifted Riley Bee is speaking in buzzes)
- You leave -
Bzz buzz?!
- You use the translator -
Get this thing out of my face!! ... Whoa - you understood me? I'm speaking with a beekeeper! That's radder than a Rad Bee!! I'm Riley Bee, Leader of the Red Bees. And this is the Red Headquarters! Here, the Red Bees and I coordinate, plan, train, and strategize... We've discovered how to boost the red flower fields! We've developed highly advanced Red Guards! That's why WE'RE the best. Red ROCKS - Blue just can't keep up! You look like a promising Red Beekeeper! But to truly become a Red Master, you'll need some guidance. Complete my quests, and I'll reward you with some ! Those can be used to boost your red pollen collection... Or to craft some of our state-of-the-art red equipment! Each time you perform a quest for me, they'll become more difficult. But every once in a while, you may just earn yourself some RIGHTEOUS rewards! Sound good? OK! Talk to me again when you're ready to start.

- Accepting -
It's time for another red-related quest. Complete it, and you'll be 1 step closer to becoming a Red Master! AND - you'll earn yourself a !  boost red pollen by x1.25 for 10 minutes... And they're used to craft some radical red equipment. After every 5th quest, I'll give you a bonus... And every once in a while - that bonus may be HUGE!!!! I've loaded the next quest into your Quest Menu. Get it done and report back!
- During -
Each time you complete one of my quests, they get harder! Harder and harder - they just keep going!!! Want to know why? CAUSE RED BEES DON'T QUIT! That's why WE'RE ON TOP!!! Go out there and finish my quest!
- Completion -
Right on right on right on!!! Good work out there, you're advancing the red cause! Here's a Red Extract to help you advance even more!! We gotta keep working, keep on fighting... Keep on keeping on to keep ahead of the Blue Bees! RED RULES!!!!!

Can't stand this cold!!!! You know us here at Red HQ - we're all about that HEAT! But you know what, I'd be lying if I said it didn't look pretty. You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Riley Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give them a present. GET OUT!!!!!!. Awee, see, I was right when I took you to be a fine beekeeper. And a good person too! So what'd you get me?? ... RIGHT ON! It's a strawberry scented air freshener! The kind you hang on the reer  view mirror of a car. I don't have a car, and I can't smell it very well out here... BUT I LOVE IT! Here, here - this is for you. MERRY BEESMAS from the Red Bees at the Red Headquarters!

Bucko Bee better not use that Snow Machine! It's TOO DANG COLD! You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Riley Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give them a present. NUH-UH! You didn't! You DID! Let me open it, let me open it! ...(krumple krumple)... OH. MY. GOSH! It's a bPad Air. 4th generation!!! The newest model! Bubble Bee Man must have gotten my letter this year. He went all out! I can use this to play ROBLOX, and Bee Swarm Simulator! Man, now I feel silly. I got a gift too, bit it's not even in the same league. I hope you like it anyways. It includes the ! With this on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose Field and Mushroom Field and +10% Pollen from Flames! Merry Beesmas! Now if you'll excuse me, I've gotta setup my bPad, oh boy oh boy.

Bucko Bee better not use that Snow Machine! It's TOO DANG COLD! You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Riley Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give them a present. NUH-UH! You didn't! You DID! Let me open it, let me open it! ...(krumple krumple)... Whaaat? It's a !!!! How on earth did you afford this? Do you realize how rare these are? We've only got 1 in the whole HQ! Man, now I feel silly. I got you a gift too, but it's not even in the same league. Hope you'll like it anyways. It includes the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose Field and Mushroom Field and +10% Pollen from Flames! Merry Beesmas! Now if you'll excuse me, I've gotta setup my bPad, oh boy oh boy.

Bucko Bee better not use that Snow Machine! It's TOO DANG COLD! You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Riley Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give them a present. WHAT! A GIFT? No way! Youuuuuuuu  Well hand it over! Come on! ...(krumple krumple)... Oh... my... gumdrops... A permanent Precise Mark! How did you get this?? Did it just, like, fail to despawn? Man, I know some beekeepers who would DIE for one of these. This is going to raise the Red HQ straight to the top! I got you something too. Not quite as OP though. It's the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive the following boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose Field and Mushroom Field and +10% Pollen from Flames! Now let's get out there and heat up the Honeydays! RED ROCKS!

Bucko Bee better not use that Snow Machine! It's TOO DANG COLD! You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Riley Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give them a present. What's that in your hands?? GET OUT!! A  for me? What could it be?! ...(krumple krumple)... WOOOOW! It's a whole book of ! How many are in here??? Like 50? This is crazy! I'm going to stick these all over the HQ. And if I don't want to talk to someone I'll just stick one of these on them. And I'll say "talk to the hand", LOL! That'll be awesome! Thanks so much! And hey. I got YOU a  too... It's the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you'll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate, +25% Capacity in the Rose Field and Mushroom Field, and +15% Pollen from Flames! That should heat things up for the Honeydays!

I should have built a roof like Bucko Bee... You are given a choice to give a present to Gifted Riley Bee or continue talking like normal. You choose to give them a present. NUH-UH! You didn’t! You DID! Let me open it, let me open it! ...(krumple krumple)... Alright! Some rechargeable wing warmers!!! Between these and the candles, I MIGHT be able to make it through this stupid, cold, long winter. Just barely. Thank you!! Now here's your gift: the ! With that on the Beesmas Tree, you’ll receive these boosts: +25% Convert Rate +25% Capacity in the Rose and Mushroom Field and +15% Pollen from Flames! Merry Beesmas! Now if you’ll excuse me, I’m gonna go warm up my flappers.

Beesmas Quest - Riley Bee's Honeyday Can.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
This is the worst Beesmas ever! It's so cold the Fire Bees can't even ignite the flowers. Demon Bee is threatening to return to the underworld. And Spicy Bee's engine is freezing up! The Blue Bees are trying to make it even WORSE with their Snow Machine! But there's still hope... if we can ignite the Honeyday Candles. They'll provide enough heat to get Red HQ operational again. But we'll need your help! Hurry up, before we all freeze to death!
- During -
N/A
- Completion -
Hurry hurry hurry, light them up! Everyone look! The beekeeper's lighting the candles! Yaaaaaaaaaaay! We're saved! With the Honeyday Candles lit, the Red Bes are back in action! Now every 4 hours, you can use it to recuit 3 temporary Red Bees for 30 minutes... And it'll also give you some Wax! Usually , but sometimes rarer ones! It's pretty rad! Well, thanks for bringing warmth back to Beesmas. Tell Bucko Bee the Snow Machine is powerless now! Happy Honeydays!

Beesmas Quest - Riley Bee's Honeyday Can.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
WHY is it so COLD in the summer??? It just ain't right. Is this some sort of sick joke? The flowers are going to DIE if it keeps snowing like this! It's just not right. Not natural. Everything's falling apart around here! What the heck did Bucko Bee do? The Blue Bees have really gone too far this time. At least we've got these candles. Once we light them up, it'll be a little warmer... But I can't leave my post so I'll need you to do it! Completing this quest should ignite their flames. But please hurry! I'm freezing my wings off!
- During -
N/A
- Completion -
Go go go! Light 'em up! Everyone look! The beekeeper's lighting the candles! Yaaaaaaaaaaay! We won't freeze to death! With the Honeyday Candles lit, the Red Bees are back in action! Now every 4 hours, you can use it to recruit 3 temporary Red Bees for 30 minutes... And it'll also give you some Wax! Usually , but sometimes rarer ones! Thank you so much! Now I can finally start enjoying Beesmas! And I hope you can as well! Have fun out there! Just don't you dare help Bucko Bee with that Snow Machine, got it?

Beesmas Quest - Riley Bee's Honeyday Can.Dialogue:
- Accepting -
This is the worst Beesmas ever! It's so cold the Fire Bees can't even ignite the flowers. Demon Bee is threatening to return to the underworld. And Spicy Bee's engine is freezing up! The Blue Bees are trying to make it even WORSE with their snow machine! But there's still hope...if we can ignite the Honeyday Candles. They'll provide enough heat to get Red HQ operational again. But we'll need your help! Hurry up, before we all freeze to death: Collect 50,000,000 Red Pollen... Collect 8 hours of Invigorating Nectar... Collect 100 Soft Waxes... Spawn 1,000 Flames... And defeat 10 Fire Ants!
- During -
N/A
- Completion -
Hurry hurry hurry, light them up! Everyone look! The beekeeper's lighting the candles! Yaaaaaaaaaaay! We're saved! With the Honeyday Candles lit, the Red Bees are back in action! Now every 4 hours, you can use it to recruit 3 temporary Red Bees for 30 minutes... And it'll also give you some Wax! Usually , but sometimes rarer ones! Waxes can be used to improve a bee's Beequip. Beequips with higher potential are more likely to roll better stats. If you have a beequip with high potential and want to test your luck, test one out! To use a Wax, just drag it to the hive slot of the bee holding the Beequip you want to alter. It's pretty rad! Well, thanks for bringing warmth back to Beesmas. Tell Bucko Bee the Snow Machine is powerless now! Happy Honeydays!
